mapper.select: SELECT PRO_CATEGORY, COUNT(*) PRO_COUNT FROM PRODUCT GROUP BY PRO_CATEGORY ORDER BY PRO_COUNT DESC
SELECT PRO_NO , PRO_NAME , PRO_PRICE , PRO_DCOMPANY , PRO_QUANTITY , PRO_CONDITION , PRO_CONTENT , USER_ID , PRO_FILENAME , PRO_CATEGORY FROM PRODUCT WHERE PRO_NO = #{pro_no}

SELECT C.CART_NO , C.USER_ID , C.PRO_NO , P.PRO_NAME , P.PRO_CONTENT , P.PRO_FILENAME , C.CART_COUNT, (P.PRO_PRICE * C.CART_COUNT) CART_PRICE , P.USER_ID SELLER FROM CART C, PRODUCT P, USERS U
C.USER_ID = U.USER_ID AND C.PRO_NO = P.PRO_NO
AND C.USER_ID = #{user_id}
ORDER BY C.CART_NO
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM CART WHERE CART_NO IN (#{cart_no})
DELETE FROM CART WHERE USER_ID IN (#{user_id})
